title: PLEASE HELP ME, LONG LOAD TIMES!!!
body: Hello anyone that is able to help me. I am dealing with long loading times after finally fixing my laptops other issues such as using an Ethernet cord for lag and updating my laptop along with repairing League of Legends to fix constant FPS drops. Now i am stuck with this long loading which has now led me being in a 5 match 20 min ban!!!! Long load times were never an issue before i fixed the first two problems.

replies.body:
This could be caused by a few different things. Since you recently made changes to your network, I recommend ensuring the rest of your local network settings are compatible with our connection guide [found here.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues)

Let me know if those steps caused any change at all.
